name: Elemental: The Game
description:
Multimedia game-like experience.
Explore the realm of Murk and gather your memory figments to unlock certain areas.
Collect the tapes to progress.

WARNING! Contains explicit language.

Almost all models are scans captured using polycam.

Made for Day[9] DK30!

Zope - programming 
tfx - programming
Hiijcat - assorted 3D renders
Sean Mackillop - soundtrack
MURK - sountrack

Ghost - beats in music videos
